Description:
Detects process access requests from hacktool processes based on their default image name

Author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems), Swachchhanda Shrawan Poudel
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: HackTool - Generic Process Access
Query: sourcetype="windows-sysmon" (process_path="*\\Akagi.exe" OR process_path="*\\Akagi64.exe" OR process_path="*\\atexec_windows.exe" OR process_path="*\\Certify.exe" OR process_path="*\\Certipy.exe" OR process_path="*\\CoercedPotato.exe" OR process_path="*\\crackmapexec.exe" OR process_path="*\\CreateMiniDump.exe" OR process_path="*\\dcomexec_windows.exe" OR process_path="*\\dpapi_windows.exe" OR process_path="*\\findDelegation_windows.exe" OR process_path="*\\GetADUsers_windows.exe" OR process_path="*\\GetNPUsers_windows.exe" OR process_path="*\\getPac_windows.exe" OR process_path="*\\getST_windows.exe" OR process_path="*\\getTGT_windows.exe" OR process_path="*\\GetUserSPNs_windows.exe" OR process_path="*\\gmer.exe" OR process_path="*\\hashcat.exe" OR process_path="*\\htran.exe" OR process_path="*\\ifmap_windows.exe" OR process_path="*\\impersonate.exe" OR process_path="*\\Inveigh.exe" OR process_path="*\\LocalPotato.exe" OR process_path="*\\mimikatz_windows.exe" OR process_path="*\\mimikatz.exe" OR process_path="*\\netview_windows.exe" OR process_path="*\\nmapAnswerMachine_windows.exe" OR process_path="*\\opdump_windows.exe" OR process_path="*\\PasswordDump.exe" OR process_path="*\\Potato.exe" OR process_path="*\\PowerTool.exe" OR process_path="*\\PowerTool64.exe" OR process_path="*\\psexec_windows.exe" OR process_path="*\\PurpleSharp.exe" OR process_path="*\\pypykatz.exe" OR process_path="*\\QuarksPwDump.exe" OR process_path="*\\rdp_check_windows.exe" OR process_path="*\\Rubeus.exe" OR process_path="*\\SafetyKatz.exe" OR process_path="*\\sambaPipe_windows.exe" OR process_path="*\\SelectMyParent.exe" OR process_path="*\\SharpChisel.exe" OR process_path="*\\SharPersist.exe" OR process_path="*\\SharpEvtMute.exe" OR process_path="*\\SharpImpersonation.exe" OR process_path="*\\SharpLDAPmonitor.exe" OR process_path="*\\SharpLdapWhoami.exe" OR process_path="*\\SharpUp.exe" OR process_path="*\\SharpView.exe" OR process_path="*\\smbclient_windows.exe" OR process_path="*\\smbserver_windows.exe" OR process_path="*\\sniff_windows.exe" OR process_path="*\\sniffer_windows.exe" OR process_path="*\\split_windows.exe" OR process_path="*\\SpoolSample.exe" OR process_path="*\\Stracciatella.exe" OR process_path="*\\SysmonEOP.exe" OR process_path="*\\temp\\rot.exe" OR process_path="*\\ticketer_windows.exe" OR process_path="*\\TruffleSnout.exe" OR process_path="*\\winPEASany_ofs.exe" OR process_path="*\\winPEASany.exe" OR process_path="*\\winPEASx64_ofs.exe" OR process_path="*\\winPEASx64.exe" OR process_path="*\\winPEASx86_ofs.exe" OR process_path="*\\winPEASx86.exe" OR process_path="*\\xordump.exe") (process_path="*\\goldenPac*" OR process_path="*\\just_dce_*" OR process_path="*\\karmaSMB*" OR process_path="*\\kintercept*" OR process_path="*\\LocalPotato*" OR process_path="*\\ntlmrelayx*" OR process_path="*\\rpcdump*" OR process_path="*\\samrdump*" OR process_path="*\\secretsdump*" OR process_path="*\\smbexec*" OR process_path="*\\smbrelayx*" OR process_path="*\\wmiexec*" OR process_path="*\\wmipersist*" OR process_path="*HotPotato*" OR process_path="*Juicy Potato*" OR process_path="*JuicyPotato*" OR process_path="*PetitPotam*" OR process_path="*RottenPotato*")
